title: 18 Practical & Useful Gifts That Your Loved Ones Will Remember
description: This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.Practical holiday gifts conjure up images of sad-colored socks unwrapped with an even-sadder frown. But let it be known: The sad sock is an anomaly, and we're here to stick up for all the truly useful presents out there. For all those loved ones who aren’t fans of indulgent gifts like decorative candles or another mug to add to an ever-growing collection, this list of actually useful, aesthetically fulfilling gifts is for you. From cozy bedding accessories to kitchen goods, these will support your pragmatic giftee in their sensible endeavors. Keep clicking for our full list, which was, informed by Refinery29 reader suggestions, anonymous shopping data on top-bought items, and professional editor hunches. All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.For more can't-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter.Anthropologie Icon Juice GlassA cutesy glass adorned with bows is a great motivator for staying hydrated. If bows don't match your loved one's style, try one of the 14 other adorable designs.Shop AnthropologieAnthropologie Icon Juice Glasses, $, available at AnthropologieLululemon Fast & Free Running BeltAnyone who runs errands (so, all of us) will appreciate this handy running belt to stay hands-free while out and about. Made with Lululemon's sweat-wicking Nulux fabric, it’s lightweight, breathable, and the perfect size for necessities like keys, cards, and your phone.Shop LululemonLululemon Fast and Free Running Belt, $, available at LululemonFP Movement Quilted CarryallFree People's Quilted Carryall seems all fun and games (with its funky, puffy fabric), but don't be fooled: This tote's spacious interior, extra-cushy shoulder strap, and secure top-zip closure make it quite the practical purchase.Shop Free PeopleFP Movement Quilted Carryall, $, available at Free PeopleSalt & Stone Body Mist TrioHow’s this for practical: Gift a friend the option to test out three of Salt & Stone’s most popular scents (in convenient travel-sized bottles) so that they can decide which one they like best before committing to a full-sized purchase.Shop Salt & Stone at RevolveSalt & Stone Body Mist Trio, $, available at RevolveFluff Co Pillow & Comforter KitEven the most serious giftees need sleep — and who wouldn’t appreciate a brand-new comforter and pillow kit? Help your loved one crush those ZZZs with Fluff Co.'s bedding, which is made by the same manufacturer of hotel pillows, only without the mark-up.Shop Fluff Co.Fluff Co. Pillow & Comforter Kit, $, available at Fluff Co.High Camp Flasks Engravable Parkside FlaskThis customizable flask includes two detachable cups and can hold up to 750 mL (aka a whole bottle of wine). Bring it to campsites or outdoor hangs, and forget about the fuss and muss of things like corkscrews or cups.Shop High Camp FlasksHigh Camp Flasks Custom Engraved Parkside Flask, $, available at High Camp FlasksAeroGarden Harvest Elite Indoor Garden SystemFor the friend with a green thumb and not a lot of free outdoor space, this hydroponic garden will allow them to grow herbs, vegetables, or flowers inside their homes. All they’ll have to do is pop the seed pods in, add plant growth food from time to time, and turn the grow light on — boom, fresh produce they can use the next time you’re over for dinner. Shop AeroGarden at AmazonAeroGarden Harvest Elite Indoor Garden, $, available at AmazonDieux Angel Eyes Reusable Eye Mask & Eye Serum BundleYour bestie will be bright eyed and bushy-tailed with this reusable eye mask and eye serum bundle. Shop DieuxDieux Angel Eyes: Reusable Eye Mask & Eye Serum Bundle, $, available at DieuxBearaby Cotton Weighted BlanketNo one really believes they need a weighted blanket until they try one and end up feeling so cozy and secure, they wonder how they ever slept without one. Made of buttery-soft organic cotton, this chunky-knit one is a stylish option that will help someone get some quality shut-eye.Shop BearabyBearaby Cotton Weighted Blanket, $, available at BearabyLeatherology Slim Card CaseTreat your friend with a far-too-old ruggedly old card case to a new, beautifully crafted, full-grain leather one that can also be personalized. It’ll make them feel like a million bucks, regardless of what’s inside it.Shop LeatherologyLeatherology Slim Card Case, $, available at LeatherologyBeekman1802 Goat Milk Bodycare Gift SetThe winter wind can be harsh on the skin, so treat your loved one to a goat milk body care gift set, which includes bar soap, whipped body cream, cleansing wipes, and invisible deodorant. They’ll thank you once their sheets, towels, shirts, socks, and underwear are softly cocooned in an intoxicatingly sumptuous scent. Shop Quince Quince Premium Down Alternative Comforter, $, available at QuincePrettyLeatherUSA Personalized Leather RFID Wallet Overly practical Etsy reviewers aplenty rave that this item is well-made, nice-looking, and very convenient. Photo: Courtesy of DedCool.

This holiday season, we’ve found the gifts that feel great to get and even better to give. Shop Well-Received, our collection of editor-approved holiday gift guides, here.

Practical holiday gifts conjure up images of sad-colored socks unwrapped with an even-sadder frown. But let it be known: The sad sock is an anomaly, and we're here to stick up for all the truly useful presents out there. 

For all those loved ones who aren’t fans of indulgent gifts like decorative candles or another mug to add to an ever-growing collection, this list of actually useful, aesthetically fulfilling gifts is for you. From cozy bedding accessories to kitchen goods, these will support your pragmatic giftee in their sensible endeavors. Keep clicking for our full list, which was, informed by Refinery29 reader suggestions, anonymous shopping data on top-bought items, and professional editor hunches.

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission.

1 of 18

Anthropologie Icon Juice Glass

A cutesy glass adorned with bows is a great motivator for staying hydrated. If bows don't match your loved one's style, try one of the 14 other adorable designs.

Shop Anthropologie

2 of 18

Lululemon Fast & Free Running Belt

Anyone who runs errands (so, all of us) will appreciate this handy running belt to stay hands-free while out and about. Made with Lululemon's sweat-wicking Nulux fabric, it’s lightweight, breathable, and the perfect size for necessities like keys, cards, and your phone.

Shop Lululemon

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

3 of 18

FP Movement Quilted Carryall

Free People's Quilted Carryall seems all fun and games (with its funky, puffy fabric), but don't be fooled: This tote's spacious interior, extra-cushy shoulder strap, and secure top-zip closure make it quite the practical purchase.

Shop Free People

4 of 18

Salt & Stone Body Mist Trio

How’s this for practical: Gift a friend the option to test out three of Salt & Stone’s most popular scents (in convenient travel-sized bottles) so that they can decide which one they like best before committing to a full-sized purchase.

Shop Salt & Stone at Revolve

5 of 18

Fluff Co Pillow & Comforter Kit

Even the most serious giftees need sleep — and who wouldn’t appreciate a brand-new comforter and pillow kit? Help your loved one crush those ZZZs with Fluff Co.'s bedding, which is made by the same manufacturer of hotel pillows, only without the mark-up.

Shop Fluff Co.

6 of 18

High Camp Flasks Engravable Parkside Flask

This customizable flask includes two detachable cups and can hold up to 750 mL (aka a whole bottle of wine). Bring it to campsites or outdoor hangs, and forget about the fuss and muss of things like corkscrews or cups.

Shop High Camp Flasks

7 of 18

AeroGarden Harvest Elite Indoor Garden System

For the friend with a green thumb and not a lot of free outdoor space, this hydroponic garden will allow them to grow herbs, vegetables, or flowers inside their homes. All they’ll have to do is pop the seed pods in, add plant growth food from time to time, and turn the grow light on — boom, fresh produce they can use the next time you’re over for dinner.

Shop AeroGarden at Amazon

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

8 of 18

Dieux Angel Eyes Reusable Eye Mask & Eye Serum Bundle

Your bestie will be bright eyed and bushy-tailed with this reusable eye mask and eye serum bundle. 

Shop Dieux

9 of 18

Bearaby Cotton Weighted Blanket

No one really believes they need a weighted blanket until they try one and end up feeling so cozy and secure, they wonder how they ever slept without one. Made of buttery-soft organic cotton, this chunky-knit one is a stylish option that will help someone get some quality shut-eye.

Shop Bearaby

10 of 18

Leatherology Slim Card Case

Treat your friend with a far-too-old ruggedly old card case to a new, beautifully crafted, full-grain leather one that can also be personalized. It’ll make them feel like a million bucks, regardless of what’s inside it.

Shop Leatherology

11 of 18

Beekman1802 Goat Milk Bodycare Gift Set

The winter wind can be harsh on the skin, so treat your loved one to a goat milk body care gift set, which includes bar soap, whipped body cream, cleansing wipes, and invisible deodorant. It  covers all your bodycare needs, during and post-shower.

Shop Beekman1802 at Ulta

12 of 18

Little Beast Striped Pet Sweatshirt

Some people only have eyes for their pets, so what could delight them more than a gift for their furry friend? This adorable striped sweatshirt will look cute on any pup while keeping them warm on winter strolls.

Shop Little Beast at Urban Outfitters

AdvertisementADVERTISEMENT

13 of 18

Brightland Luminous 4-Piece Set

You can never have too much olive oil in your kitchen. While we always suggest Brightland’s classic duo, this four-item set includes a handful of other intriguing pantry items,  such as a Parasol citrus champagne vinegar and an orange-blossom honey.

Shop Nordstrom

Comfy, durable, and easy to style — the Ugg Tasman X Waterproof Clog is as sensible as it is fun.

Shop Nordstrom

Tracy's Dog OG Flow, 2-In-1 Clit Sucking Vibrator

While a bit personal, what’s a better gift to your best and closest gal pal than some self-love? Vibrators are surprisingly expensive, and a tool that exists solely to achieve climax is, quite arguably, very useful. Shop Tushy

17 of 18

DedCool Milk DedTergent

Sure, this Instagram-worthy tin looks incredibly gift-worthy, but $35 for a laundry detergent?! Before your giftees exhale their pfffts, consider the bucks they've shelled out over the years for status candles with 60-hour burn times compared to 60 loads of laundry that come out of the wash smelling like something that puts Diptyque Paris to shame. They’ll thank you once their sheets, towels, shirts, socks, and underwear are softly cocooned in an intoxicatingly sumptuous scent. (One of our writers tried it, and they can confirm that it's, indeed, heavenly).

Shop DedCool

Chances are your sensible giftee is fairly orderly — this very clever over-the-sink drying rack will delight their clean-kitchen sensibilities.
